subject: Re: [junit] NEW Object instance
msgSnippet: ... The Java Language Specification says that new can only either throw an exception or return a new object, so if that broke, Java itself would be broken.
messageBody:
Kamal Ahmed wrote:

> How can we verify, using JUnit if an object is really created, if a "new"
> operator is used to instantiate an object.

The Java Language Specification says that "new" can only either throw an
exception or return a new object, so if that broke, Java itself would be
broken.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info

JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
